mapper.select: SELECT O.O_NUM , O.C_ID , O.O_DATE , O.TOTAL , O.RECEIPT , O.S_ID , S.S_NAME , O.PAY_METHOD FROM ORDERS O JOIN STORE S ON O.S_ID = S.S_ID WHERE O.C_ID= #{cId} ORDER BY O.O_DATE DESC
SELECT 'OR'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yymmdd')||LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(O_NUM,9)),0)+1,4,0) FROM ORDERS WHERE S_ID = #{sId} AND O_NUM LIKE '%'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yymmdd')||'%'
SELECT SUM(O.TOTAL) TOTALS FROM ORDERS O JOIN STORE S ON O.S_ID = S.S_ID WHERE O.C_ID= #{cId}
